# Ternary

[![Project Status:
Active](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#project-statuses)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/ms609/Ternary/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/ms609/Ternary)
[![CRAN Status
Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/Ternary)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=Ternary)
[![CRAN
Downloads](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/Ternary)](https://ms609.github.io/usage/#ternary)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/111806977.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/111806977)

‘Ternary’ is an R package that allows the creation of ternary plots
(a.k.a. ternary graphs / simplex plots / Gibbs triangles / de Finetti
diagrams) and Holdridge life zone diagrams using the familiar functions
of the default ‘graphics’ package.

![Example ternary
plot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1695515/233467338-88a3b3a8-5580-4924-a11e-06dc8a38b3e9.png)

Example ternary plot

For simple use cases, generate ternary plots using the point-and-click
Shiny app:

``` r
install.packages("Ternary")
Ternary::TernaryApp()
```

For greater control over your plots, use the R command line; usage
instructions are available for [Ternary
plots](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/articles/Ternary.html) (with an
[introductory vignette for R
beginners](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/articles/new-users.html)),
and for [Holdridge
plots](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/articles/Holdridge.html).

Install the development version from GitHub with

``` r
devtools::install_github("ms609/Ternary", args = "--recursive")
```

This requires [git](https://git-scm.com/) to be installed and added to
your PATH system environment variable. You may also require the
‘[curl](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=curl)’ R package.

Please let me know of any feature requests or bugs by [opening an issue
on GitHub](https://github.com/ms609/Ternary/issues/).

## Citation

You can cite this package as:

Smith, Martin R. (2017). *Ternary: An R Package for Creating Ternary
Plots.* Comprehensive R Archive Network,
[doi:10.5281/zenodo.1068996](https://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1068996).

## See also

The R package ‘[ggtern](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ggtern)’
implements ternary plots within the ‘ggplot2’ framework.

Please note that the ‘Ternary’ project is released with a [Contributor
Code of Conduct](https://ms609.github.io/packages/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

# Package index

## Creating ternary plots

Functions for plotting straightforward data onto a ternary plot.

- [`TernaryApp()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryApp.md)
  : Graphical user interface for creating ternary plots
- [`TernaryPlot()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryPlot.md)
  [`HorizontalGrid()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryPlot.md)
  : Create a ternary plot
- [`AddToTernary()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryArrows()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryLines()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryPoints()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryPolygon()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernarySegments()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryText()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`JoinTheDots()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`AddToHoldridge()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeArrows()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeLines()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgePoints()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgePolygon()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeText()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  : Add elements to ternary or Holdridge plot
- [`Annotate()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/Annotate.md)
  : Annotate points on a ternary plot

## Creating Holdridge plots

Functions for drawing and adding data to a Holdridge plot.

- [`AddToTernary()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryArrows()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryLines()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryPoints()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryPolygon()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernarySegments()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`TernaryText()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`JoinTheDots()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`AddToHoldridge()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeArrows()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeLines()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgePoints()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgePolygon()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  [`HoldridgeText()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/AddToTernary.md)
  : Add elements to ternary or Holdridge plot
- [`HoldridgeHypsometricCol()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/HoldridgeHypsometricCol.md)
  : Convert a point in evapotranspiration-precipitation space to an
  appropriate cross-blended hypsometric colour
- [`HoldridgePlot()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/HoldridgePlot.md)
  [`HoldridgeBelts()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/HoldridgePlot.md)
  [`HoldridgeHexagons()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/HoldridgePlot.md)
  : Plot life zones on a Holdridge plot
- [`holdridge`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/holdridge.md)
  : Random sample of points for Holdridge plotting
- [`holdridgeClasses`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/holdridgeClasses.md)
  [`holdridgeLifeZones`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/holdridgeClasses.md)
  [`holdridgeLifeZonesUp`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/holdridgeClasses.md)
  [`holdridgeClassesUp`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/holdridgeClasses.md)
  : Names of the 38 classes defined with the Holdridge system

## Coordinates

Functions for manipulating co-ordinates.

- [`OutsidePlot()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/OutsidePlot.md)
  : Is a point in the plotting area?
- [`TernaryXRange()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryXRange.md)
  [`TernaryYRange()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryXRange.md)
  : X and Y coordinates of ternary plotting area
- [`ReflectedEquivalents()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/ReflectedEquivalents.md)
  : Reflected equivalents of points outside the ternary plot
- [`TernaryCoords()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryCoords.md)
  [`TernaryToXY()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryCoords.md)
  : Convert ternary coordinates to Cartesian space
- [`TriangleCentres()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TriangleCentres.md)
  : Coordinates of triangle mid-points
- [`XYToTernary()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/XYToTernary.md)
  [`XYToHoldridge()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/XYToTernary.md)
  [`XYToPetPrec()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/XYToTernary.md)
  : Cartesian coordinates to ternary point

## Contouring

Functions for adding contours and shading to ternary plots.

- [`ColourTernary()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/ColourTernary.md)
  [`ColorTernary()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/ColourTernary.md)
  : Colour ternary plot
- [`TernaryContour()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryContour.md)
  : Add contours to a ternary plot
- [`TernaryDensityContour()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryDensityContour.md)
  : Add contours of estimated point density to a ternary plot
- [`TernaryPointValues()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryPointValues.md)
  [`TernaryDensity()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryPointValues.md)
  : Evaluate function over a grid
- [`TernaryTiles()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TernaryTiles.md)
  : Paint tiles on ternary plot
- [`TriangleCentres()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TriangleCentres.md)
  : Coordinates of triangle mid-points
- [`TriangleInHull()`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/TriangleInHull.md)
  : Does triangle overlap convex hull of points?

## Colour palettes

Colourblind-compatible palettes.

- [`cbPalette8`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/cbPalettes.md)
  [`cbPalette13`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/cbPalettes.md)
  [`cbPalette15`](https://ms609.github.io/Ternary/reference/cbPalettes.md)
  : Palettes compatible with colour blindness
